name: hum
description: HUM - Synchronized Music Listening (Phase 1: The Sync Engine)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
